Title: Requires the department of state to promulgate rules and regulations providing for the recognition of Indian tribes as Indian Nations
Summary: Requires the department of state to promulgate rules and regulations providing for the recognition of Indian tribes as Indian Nations; further requires an annual report to the legislature.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the Indian law, in relation to requiring the department of state to promulgate rules and regulations providing for the recognition of Indian tribes as Indian Nations
